channel.title: ABC15 Arizona | Phoenix AZ | Facebook RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an RSS feed of the three most recent posts at https://www.facebook.com/ABC15

item.title: Ready to boost your paycheck and land your dream job in tim
item.description: Ready to boost your paycheck and land your dream job in time for fall? Dive into the ABC15 Virtual Job Fair and discover amazing opportunities from the coolest companies in the Valley! With top-notch salaries and perks that'll make you jump for joy, this is your ticket to success! Whether you're aiming for a fatter wallet or treating your family to the best, don't miss out! MORE: abc15.com/JobFair #abc15sponsor #jobfair #virtualjobfair

item.title: From leading students to fellow teachers, Karen Hudson has d
item.description: From leading students to fellow teachers, Karen Hudson has done it all in the field of education! This year at Paradise Valley Union School District marks her 50th year working as a teacher!

item.title: The suspects in a foiled plot to attack Taylor Swift’s shows
item.description: The suspects in a foiled plot to attack Taylor Swift’s shows in Austria this month were on a mission to kill “tens of thousands” of fans before the CIA disrupted their plans.
